# Disclaimer

This directory contains the original modules of [Menhir](https://gitlab.inria.fr/fpottier/menhir/-/tree/master/driver/stage2?ref_type=heads) and [Ocamllex](https://github.com/ocaml/ocaml/tree/trunk/lex) pertaining to parsing
the their syntaxes, slightly modified as necessary for server analysis (e.g. to make some errors non-fatal, to annotate syntax nodes with locations, etc.).

All rights go to their respective authors.
